page.title: 03Industry and Employment
page.content:
The main source of employment in the area is the Phurnacite. A new industrial estate has recently developed on the wide, flat valley floor of the Cynon, called the Aberaman Park Industrial Estate. The estate is formed of industrial units of varying size, and includes firms making upholstery, replacement windows, etc. Most of the other industrial Units are located along the A4059 and include chicken packaging, soft drink distributors, car spraying.
Since the industry of the area is dominated by the Phurnacite, the next page will describe the plant in detail.
